channel.title: Patterns on Bits and pieces to remember
channel.description: Recent content in Patterns on Bits and pieces to remember

item.title: all the little things (rubyonales) - Sandi Metz
item.author: roman.heinrich@gmail.com
item.description: Beatiful talk from Sandy Metz about refactoring from big methods to simple, small objects Takeaways Duplication is far cheaper than the wrong abstraction Reach for open/closed small methods are simple small objects are simple
